passives.name: Sear
passives.effect: Damaging Monsters burns them for (60 + 30% Ability Power + 5% bonus Attack Damage + 2% bonus Health) magic damage over 5 seconds.Challenging Path: Smiting 5 times consumes this item upgrade your Smite to Challenging Smite and increases its damage to monsters. Challenging Smite marks champions for 4 seconds. During this time, you deal  48 - 125 (based on level) bonus true damage to them over 2.5 seconds on hit and take 20% reduced damage from them.Huntsman: Killing Large Monsters grants bonus experience.Recoup: Regen up to 8 - 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the Jungle or River. Consuming this item grants all item effects permanently and increases Smite damage to monsters. If you have gained more gold from minions than jungle monsters, gold and experience from minions is heavily reduced. Healing is not reduced on AoE attacks. If two levels behind the average champion level of the game, monster kills grant bonus experience. Only attacks and abilities apply Challenging Smite's burn

1039.name: Hailblade

passives.name: Sear
passives.effect: Damaging Monsters burns them for (60 + 30% Ability Power + 5% bonus Attack Damage + 2% bonus Health) magic damage over 5 seconds.Chilling Path: Smiting 5 times consumes this item upgrade your Smite to Chilling Smite and increases its damage to monsters. When smiting champions Chilling Smite deals 20 - 156 (based on level) true damage and steals 20% of their Move Speed for 2 seconds.Huntsman: Killing Large Monsters grants bonus experience.Recoup: Regen up to 8 - 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the Jungle or River. Consuming this item grants all item effects permanently and increases Smite damage to monsters. If you have gained more gold from minions than jungle monsters, gold and experience from minions is heavily reduced. Healing is not reduced on AoE attacks. If two levels behind the average champion level of the game, monster kills grant bonus experience.

1039.plaintext: Provides damage against Monsters and Mana Regen in the Jungle

passives.name: Steeltipped
passives.effect: Attacks apply 15 physical damage On-Hit.

passives.name: Focus
passives.effect: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions.Recovery: Restores 6 Health every 5 seconds.Endure: Restores up to 40 Health over 8 seconds after taking damage from a champion, large jungle monster, or epic jungle monster. Restoration increases when you are low Health.Endure 66% effective when owned by Ranged champions or when taking damage from area of effect or periodic damage sources.

passives.name: Warmonger
passives.effect: Gain 2.5% Omnivamp.Omnivamp is only 33% effective when dealing area of effect damage or damage through pets.

passives.name: Focus
passives.effect: Attacks deal an additional 5 physical damage to minions. Siphon: Killing a minion restores 6 Mana. If you can't gain Mana, restore 3 Health instead.

1082.name: Dark Seal

passives.name: Glory
passives.effect: Gain 2 stacks for a champion kill or 1 stacks for an assist (up to 10 stacks total). Lose 4 stacks on death.Dread: Grants 5 Ability Power per stack of Glory.Obtained Glory stacks are preserved between this item and Mejai's Soulstealer.

1082.plaintext: Provides Ability Power and Mana.  Increases in power as you kill enemies.

1083.name: Cull

passives.name: Reap
passives.effect: Attacks restore 3 Health per hit.Reap: Killing a lane minion grants 1 additional gold. Killing 100 lane minions grants an additional 350 bonus gold immediately and disables Reap.

1083.plaintext: Provides damage and Life Steal on hit - Killing minions grant bonus Gold

2003.name: Health Potion
2003.description: Active - Consume: Drink the potion to restore 150 Health over 15 seconds.You may carry up to 5 Health Potions.
2003.plaintext: Consume to restore Health over time

2010.name: Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will
2010.description: Active - Consume: Eat the biscuit to restore 10% missing Health and Mana over 5 seconds. Consuming or selling a biscuit permanently grants 50 maximum Mana.

2015.name: Kircheis Shard

passives.name: Energized
passives.effect: Moving and Attacking will generate an Energized Attack.Jolt: Energized Attacks gain an additional 80 magic damage.

2015.plaintext: Attack speed and a chargable magic hit

2031.name: Refillable Potion
2031.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.
2031.plaintext: Restores Health over time. Refills at shop.

2033.name: Corrupting Potion
2033.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health and 75 Mana over 12 seconds. During this time, damaging Abilities and Attacks burn enemy champions for 15 (20 if you cannot gain Mana) magic damage over 3 seconds. Holds up to 3 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.Corrupting damage is reduced to 50% when triggered by area of effect or periodic damage.
2033.plaintext: Restores Health and Mana over time and boosts combat power - Refills at Shop

passives.name: Recovery
passives.effect: Restores 20 Health every 5 seconds.

passives.name: Undaunted
passives.effect: Blocks 15 damage from attacks and spells from champions (25% effectiveness vs. damage over time abilities).

passives.name: Legendary
passives.effect: This item counts as a Legendary item.

2055.name: Control Ward
2055.description: Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards. You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.
2055.plaintext: Used to disable wards and invisible traps in an area.

2065.name: Shurelya's Battlesong

passives.name: Motivate
passives.effect: Empowering or Protecting another ally Champion grants both allies 25% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.An ally can only be effected by Motivate once every 4 seconds.

2065.description: Active - Inspire: Grants nearby allies 30% Move Speed for 4 seconds (75s cooldown).
2065.plaintext: Activate to speed up nearby allies.

2138.name: Elixir of Iron
2138.description: Active - Consume: Drink to gain 300 Health, 25% Tenacity, and increased champion size for 3 minutes. While active, moving leaves a path behind that boosts allied champions' Move Speed by 15%.Drinking a different Elixir will replace the existing one's effects.
2138.plaintext: Temporarily increases defenses. Leaves a trail for allies to follow.

2139.name: Elixir of Sorcery
2139.description: Active - Consume: Drink to gain 50 Ability Power and 15% Mana Regen for 3 minutes. While active, damaging a champion or turret deals 25 bonus true damage (5s cooldown).Champion level 9 or greater required to purchase. Elixir of Sorcery's true damage effect has no cooldown when attacking turrets. Drinking a different Elixir will replace the existing one's effects.
2139.plaintext: Temporarily grants Ability Power and Bonus Damage to champions and turrets.

2140.name: Elixir of Wrath
2140.description: Active - Consume: Drink to gain 30 Attack Damage and 15% Physical Vamp (against champions) for 3 minutes.Drinking a different Elixir will replace the existing one's effects.
2140.plaintext: Temporarily grants Attack Damage and heals you when dealing physical damage to champions.

2403.name: Minion Dematerializer
2403.description: Active - Consume: Kill target lane minion (10s ).

2419.name: Commencing Stopwatch
2419.description: Transforms into a Stopwatch after 14 minutes. Takedowns reduce this timer by 2 minutes. That Stopwatch contributes 250 gold to the items it builds into.Stopwatch normally contributes 650 gold

2420.name: Stopwatch
2420.description: Active - Stasis: Use one time only to become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (transforms into a Broken Stopwatch).
2420.plaintext: Activate to become invincible but unable to take actions

2421.name: Broken Stopwatch
2421.description: Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

passives.name: Slightly quicker
passives.effect: Grants an additional 10 Move Speed. Boots that build from Slightly Magical Footwear retain this bonus Move Speed.

2423.name: Perfectly Timed Stopwatch
2423.description: Active - Stasis: Use one time only to become Invulnerable and Untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but are prevented from taking any other actions during this time (transforms into a Broken Stopwatch).
2423.plaintext: Activate to become invincible but unable to take actions

2424.description: Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

passives.effect: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to 2.5% max Mana.

Healing or shielding another ally will enhance both of you, causing the next damage to enemy champions to apply 60% Grievous Wounds.Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

passives.name: Saving Grace
passives.effect: Upon taking lethal damage, restores 50% base Health and 30% max Mana after 4 seconds of stasis (300s cooldown).

passives.effect: If you have at least 60% Critical Strike Chance, gain35% Critical Strike Damage.

3033.name: Mortal Reminder

passives.name: Sepsis
passives.effect: Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds. 3033.plaintext: Overcomes enemies with high Health recovery and Armor

passives.effect: Deal up to 15% bonus physical damage against champions with greater max Health than you.Max damage increase reached when Health difference is greater than 2000.

passives.effect: Gain bonus Ability Power equal to 5% bonus Mana.Empyrean: Increase your maximum mana by 5% + 2.5% per 100 AP.

3041.name: Mejai's Soulstealer

passives.name: Glory
passives.effect: Gain 4 stacks for a champion kill or 2 stacks for an assist (up to 25 stacks total). Lose 10 stacks on death.

passives.effect: Grants 5 Ability Power per stack of Glory. Gain 10% Move Speed if you have at least 10 stacks.Obtained Glory stacks are preserved between this item and Dark Seal.

3041.plaintext: Grants Ability Power for kills and assists

passives.name: Awe
passives.effect: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to 2.5% max Mana. Shock: Attacks against champions deal an additional 1.5% Max Mana physical damage (On-Hit). Damaging Abilities against champions deal an additional (3.5% for Melee users | 2.7% for Ranged users) Max Mana + 6% Total AD physical damage.

3050.plaintext: Grants you and your ally bonuses when you cast your ultimate.

passives.name: Nimble
passives.effect: Attacking a unit grants (20 | 10 for Ranged champions) Move Speed for 2 seconds.

3053.name: Sterak's Gage

Stacks beyond the first heal for 50% less.Lifeline: Upon taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a 100 Shield (increased by (8% max Health | 4.8% max Health for Ranged champions) per stack of Bloodlust) for 4 seconds (60s cooldown).Bloodlust stacks up to 5 times; 1 per champion. Healing and bonus shielding reduced to 60% for Ranged users.

3053.plaintext: Shields against large bursts of damage

3068.name: Sunfire Aegis

passives.name: Immolate
passives.effect: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds. Damaging Champions or Epic Monsters with this effect adds a stack, increasing subsequent Immolate damage by 12% for 5 seconds (max stacks 6).Flametouch: At maximum Immolate stacks, your Attacks burn nearby enemies for your Immolate damage per second for 3 seconds.Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5% Tenacity and Slow Resist.

3068.plaintext: High armor. Constantly deals damage to nearby enemies. Immobilize enemies to release a wave of damaging flame

3072.name: Bloodthirster

passives.name: Thorns

passives.name: Consecrate
passives.effect: Grant nearby allied champions 5 Armor and Magic Resist.

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 2 Armor/Magic Resist increase to Consecrate.Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.Subsequent Devotion shields within 20 seconds only have 25% effect.

3190.description: Active - Devotion: Grant nearby allies a 230 - 385 (based on ally level) Shield, decaying over 2.5 seconds (90s cooldown).
3190.plaintext: Activate to shield nearby allies from damage

passives.name: Witch's Path
passives.effect: Killing a unit grants 0.5 Armor (max 15).

3193.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate

passives.name: Fortify
passives.effect: Taking damage from a champion grants a stack of 5% bonus Armor and 5% bonus Magic Resist for 6 seconds.Max 5 stacks; 1 per champion.

3193.description: Active - Unbreakable: Gain a (100 + 100% bonus Health) Shield  that decays and grow 25% in size for 2.5 seconds. (90s cooldown).
3193.plaintext: Greatly increases defense near multiple enemies.

3211.name: Spectre's Cowl

passives.name: Incorporeal
passives.effect: After taking damage from a champion, gain 150% base Health Regen for up to 10 seconds (duration increases with damage taken).

3211.plaintext: Improves defense and grants regeneration upon being damaged

3222.name: Mikael's Blessing
3222.description: Active - Purify: Remove all crowd control debuffs (except Knockups and Suppression) from an ally champion and restore 100 - 200 (based on ally level) Health (120s cooldown).
3222.plaintext: Activate to remove all disabling effects from an allied champion

3330.name: Scarecrow Effigy
3330.description: Cannot be soldActive - Trinket: Places an effigy that lasts for 130 - 300 (based on level) seconds and appears exactly as Fiddlesticks does to enemies. Stores one charge every 115 - 30 (based on level) seconds, up to maximum 2 charges.Enemy champions approaching an effigy will activate it, causing the effigy to fake a random action, after which the effigy will fall apart.

3340.name: Stealth Ward
3340.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

3363.name: Farsight Alteration
3363.description: Active - Trinket: Reveals an area and places a visible, fragile Ward up to 4000 units away. Allies cannot target this Ward with Summoner Spells or Abilities (198 - 99s cooldown).
3363.plaintext: Grants increased range and reveals the targetted area

3364.name: Oracle Lens
3364.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).
3364.plaintext: Disables nearby invisible wards and traps for a duration

3400.name: Your Cut
3400.description: Active - Consume: Gain 0 gold.Bonus gold given to an ally when Pyke executes an enemy champion using his Ultimate Ability. If no ally was involved in the kill, Pyke gets to keep the Cut!

3504.name: Ardent Censer

passives.name: Sanctify
passives.effect: Healing or Shielding another ally enhances you both for 6 seconds, granting your Attacks 10% - 30% (based on ally level) Attack Speed and 5 - 20 (based on ally level) magic damage On-Hit. Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

3504.plaintext: Shield and heal effects on other units grant both of you Attack Speed and their attacks deal additional on-hit magic damage.

passives.name: Spellblade
passives.effect: After using an Ability, your next Attack deals an additional 100% Base Attack Damage + 40% Bonus Attack Damage physical damage On-Hit and restores 40% of that damage as mana (1.5s cooldown).

3513.name: Eye of the Herald
3513.description: Active - Consume: Crush the Eye of the Herald after 1 second, summoning the Rift Herald to siege enemy turrets.Glimpse of the Void: The holder of the Eye of the Herald has Empowered Recall.The Eye of the Herald will be lost to the Void if not used within 240 seconds.
3513.plaintext: Eye of the Herald - a Gift of the Void.

3599.name: Kalista's Black Spear
3599.description: Active - Consume: Bind with an ally for the remainder of the game, becoming Oathsworn Allies. Oathsworn empowers you both while near one another.
3599.plaintext: Kalista's spear that binds an Oathsworn Ally.

3600.name: Kalista's Black Spear
3600.description: Active - Consume: Bind with an ally for the remainder of the game, becoming Oathsworn Allies. Oathsworn empowers you both while near one another.Required to use Kalista's Ultimate Ability.
3600.plaintext: Kalista's spear that binds an Oathsworn Ally.

3742.name: Dead Man's Plate

passives.name: Shipwrecker
passives.effect: While moving, build up to 40 bonus Move Speed. Your next Attack discharges built up Move Speed to deal up to 40 (+100% base Attack Damage) physical damage. If dealt by a Melee champion at top speed, the Attack also Slows the target by 50% for 1 second.

3742.plaintext: Build momentum as you move around then smash into enemies.

3748.name: Titanic Hydra

passives.name: Colossus
passives.effect: Gain bonus Attack Damage equal to 2% bonus Health.Cleave: Attacks apply an additional (5 + 1.5% max Health) physical damage On-Hit, creating a shockwave that deals (40 + 3% max Health)  physical damage to enemies behind the target.Deals 75% for Ranged users. On-Hit damage is also applied to Structures.

3748.plaintext: Deals area of effect damage based on owner's health

passives.name: Enlighten
passives.effect: Upon levelling up, restores 20% max Mana over 3 seconds.

passives.name: Annul
passives.effect: Gain a Spell Shield that blocks the next enemy Ability (40s cooldown).Item's cooldown is restarted if you take damage before it is completed.

3850.name: Spellthief's Edge

passives.name: Tribute
passives.effect: While nearby an ally champion, damaging Abilities and Attacks against champions or buildings grant 20 gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds.Quest: Earn 500 gold from this item to transform it into Frostfang, gaining Active - Warding.This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

3850.plaintext: Gain gold and upgrade by damaging enemy champions

3851.name: Frostfang

passives.name: Tribute
passives.effect: While nearby an ally champion, damaging Abilities and Attacks against champions or buildings grant 20 gold. This can occur up to 3 times every 30 seconds.Quest: Earn 500 gold from this item to transform it into Frostfang, gaining Active - Warding.This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

passives.effect: Earn 1000 gold from this item to transform it into Shard of True Ice.

passives.name: Spoils of War
passives.effect: While nearby an allied champion, Attacks execute minions below (50% for Melee Users | 30% for Ranged Users) of their max Health. Killing a minion grants the same kill gold to the nearest allied champion. These effects recharge every 35 seconds (Max 3 charges).

passives.name: Quest
passives.effect: Earn 500 gold from this item to transform it into Runesteel Spaulders, gaining Active - Warding.This item grants reduced gold from minions if you kill excessive numbers of them.

3854.plaintext: Gain gold and upgrade by executing minions alongside allies

passives.name: Cursed
passives.effect: Dealing magic damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

passives.name: Coordinated Fire
passives.effect: Abilities that Slow or Immobilize a champion deal 36 - 60 (based on level) bonus magic damage and marks them for 4 seconds (6s cooldown per champion). Ally champion damage detonates the mark, dealing an additional 90 - 150 (based on ally level) magic damage and granting you both 20% Move Speed for 2 seconds. Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 15 Ability Power. Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

4401.name: Force of Nature

passives.name: Absorb
passives.effect: Taking damage from Abilities grants you 8 Move Speed and 4 Magic Resist for 5 seconds (stacks up to 5 times; each unique Ability instance can give one stack).

4401.plaintext: Movement Speed, Magic Resist, and max Health Regeneration

passives.name: Doing Something
passives.effect: You are permanently On Fire!

4628.name: Horizon Focus

passives.name: Hypershot
passives.effect: Damaging a champion with a non-targeted Ability at over 700 range or Immobilizing them Reveals them and increases their damage taken from you by 10% for 6 seconds. The Ability that triggers Hypershot also benefits from the damage increase. Pets and non-immobilizing traps do not trigger this effect. Only the initial placement of zone Abilities will trigger this effect. Distance is measured from the Ability cast position.

4628.plaintext: Immobilizing a champion causes lightning to strike them

passives.name: Spelldance
passives.effect: If you have at least 160 Ability Power, gain 20 Ability Haste and 20 Move Speed.

passives.name: Adaptive
passives.effect: Killing a unit grants 0.3 Magic Resist (max 9).

passives.name: Void Corruption
passives.effect: For each second damaging enemy champions, deal 3% bonus damage (max 9%). At maximum strength, the bonus damage is dealt as true damage instead. Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 2% Omnivamp and 8 Ability Power.

passives.name: Soulrend
passives.effect: Damaging a champion deals an additional (125 +15% Ability Power magic damage) and grants you 25% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds (40s cooldown per champion).

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.Damaging a new champion will extend the duration of the Move Speed bonus.

passives.name: Azakana Gaze
passives.effect: Dealing Ability damage burns enemies for 1.2% max Health magic damage every second for 4 seconds. You gain 10 Armor and Magic Resist  if a champion is affected (+2.5 Armor and Magic Resist for each additional champion affected).

passives.name: Arcane Cache
passives.effect: This item can store up to 3 purchased Control Wards.After completing the Support Quest and reaching Level 13, transforms into Vigilant Wardstone.

passives.name: Arcane Cache
passives.effect: This item can store up to 3 purchased Control Wards.Behold: Increase your Stealth Ward and Control Ward placement caps by 1.

passives.name: Blessing of Ixtal
passives.effect: Grants a 12% increase to bonus Health, Ability Haste, and Ability Power.Upgrades from Watchful Sightstone.

6029.name: Ironspike Whip
6029.description: Active - Crescent: Deal (75% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies. (20s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).

6035.name: Silvermere Dawn
6035.description: Active - Quicksilver: Remove all crowd control debuffs (excluding Airborne) and gain 40% Tenacity and 40% Slow Resistance for 3 seconds (90s cooldown).

passives.name: Ignore Pain
passives.effect: 35% (15% for Ranged users) of physical damage taken is dealt to you over 3 seconds instead.

passives.name: Defy
passives.effect: Champion takedowns cleanse Ignore Pain's remaining damage pool and restore 15% of max Health over 2 seconds.

passives.name: Hackshorn
passives.effect: Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds. If the target is below 50% Health, this effect is increased to 60% Grievous Wounds.Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects.

6616.name: Staff of Flowing Water

passives.name: Rapids
passives.effect: Healing or Shielding another ally grants you both 25 - 45 Ability Power  and 20 Ability Haste for 4 seconds.Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

6616.plaintext: Your heals and shields reduce crowd control and grant movement speed

6617.name: Moonstone Renewer

passives.name: Starlit Grace
passives.effect: When affecting champions with Attacks or Abilities in combat, restore 70 Health to the most wounded nearby ally (2s cooldown). Each second spent in combat with champions increases your Heal and Shield Power by 7% (stacking up to 5 times).

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 10 increased health on Starlit Grace's heal.

6617.plaintext: Your heals and shields cool down faster and have greater effect on low health allies

6630.name: Goredrinker

passives.name: Spite
passives.effect: Gain 1% Attack Damage for each 5% missing Health (max 15%).

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

6630.description: Active - Thirsting Slash: Deal (100% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies. Restore (25% Attack Damage + 10% missing Health) for each champion hit (15s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).

6631.name: Stridebreaker

passives.name: Heroic Gait
passives.effect: Dealing physical damage grants 20 Move Speed for 3 seconds.

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 2% Move Speed.

6631.description: Active - Halting Slash: Deal (100% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies, Slowing them by 40% for 3 seconds (15s , reduced by Ability Haste). Can be cast while moving.

passives.name: Spellblade
passives.effect: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional 12% (9% for Ranged owners) target max Health physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown). If the target is a champion, restore 50% of the enhanced damage (30% for Ranged owners). Spellblade will deal a minimum of (150% base Attack Damage) damage to units, but no more than (250% base Attack Damage) damage to Monsters.

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 5% Armor Penetration and 5% Magic Penetration.

6653.name: Liandry's Anguish

passives.name: Agony
passives.effect: Deal up to 12% bonus magic damage to Champions based on the target's bonus Health (maxed at 1250 bonus Health).

passives.name: Torment
passives.effect: Dealing damage with Abilities causes enemies to burn for (15 + 1.5% Ability Power) + 1% max Health magic damage per second for 4 seconds.

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

6653.plaintext: Charge up in combat to deal high damage over time, especially against durable enemies

6655.name: Luden's Tempest

passives.name: Echo
passives.effect: Damaging Abilities deal an additional (100 + 10% Ability Power) magic damage to the target and 3 nearby enemies and grants you 15% Move Speed for 2 seconds (10s cooldown). Dealing ability damage to Champions reduces this item's cooldown by 0.5 second, up to 3 seconds per spell cast.

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Magic Penetration.

6655.plaintext: High burst damage, good against fragile foes

6656.name: Everfrost

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 15 Ability Power.

6656.description: Active - Glaciate: Deal (100+30% Ability Power) magic damage in a cone, Slowing enemies by 65% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies at the center of the cone are Rooted instead (30s cooldown).

passives.name: Immolate
passives.effect: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (15 + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 25% against monsters) for 3 seconds.

6662.name: Frostfire Gauntlet

passives.name: Immolate
passives.effect: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds.

passives.name: Snowbind
passives.effect: Attacks create a frost field for 1.5 seconds (4s cooldown, 6s cooldown for ranged champions). Enemies that move across the field are Slowed by 25% for melee champions and 12.5% for ranged champions (increased by your max Health).

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 100 Health and 6% Size.

6662.plaintext: High Magic Resist.Passively slow nearby enemies. When spells are cast near you, release a wave of energy that damages and slows.

6664.name: Turbo Chemtank

passives.name: Immolate
passives.effect: Taking or dealing damage causes you to begin dealing (20 - 40 (based on level) + 1% bonus Health) magic damage per second to nearby enemies (increased by 25% against minions and 150% against monsters) for 3 seconds.

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste

6664.description: Active - Supercharged: Grants 40% Move Speed towards enemies or enemy turrets for 4 seconds. Once near an enemy (or after 4 seconds) a shockwave is emitted that Slows nearby champions by 50% for 1.5 seconds (90s cooldown).
6664.plaintext: Immobilize enemies to gain a shield. Activate to run faster at opponents.

passives.name: Precision
passives.effect: Attacks deal an additional 20 physical damage to Minions and Monsters.

6671.name: Galeforce

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 2% Move Speed.

6671.description: Active - Cloudburst: Dash in target direction, firing three missiles at the lowest Health enemy near your destination (prioritizing champions). Deals a total of (180 - 220 (based on level) + 45% bonus Attack Damage) magic damage, increased against low Health targets by up to 50% (90s cooldown). Maximum missile damage dealt when enemy Health is below 30%.Cloudburst's dash cannot pass through terrain.

passives.name: Bring It Down:
passives.effect: Every third Attack deals an additional (60 + 45% bonus Attack Damage) true damage.

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 10% Attack Speed.

passives.name: Lifeline
passives.effect: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a 250 - 700 Shield for 3s. In addition, gain 15-35 Attack Damage for 8s (90s ).

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Attack Damage and 50 Health.

passives.name: Deft Strikes
passives.effect: Your critical strikes with Attacks reduce your non-Ultimate Ability cooldowns by 20% of their remaining cooldown.

passives.name: Death and Taxes
passives.effect: Dealing damage that would leave an enemy champion below 5% Health executes them. Champion kills grant an additional 25 gold.

passives.name: Wrath
passives.effect: Your Critical Strike Chance is converted into On-Hit damage. Gain 35 On-Hit for each 20% Critical Strike Chance converted.

passives.name: Nightstalker
passives.effect: Attacking a champion deals an additional (65 + 25% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage (15s cooldown). If dealt by a Melee champion, this Attack also Slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds.  When a champion that you have damaged within the last 3 seconds dies, this cooldown is refreshed and you become Invisible for 1.5 seconds.

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

passives.name: Ever Rising Moon
passives.effect: Hitting a champion with 2 separate Attacks or Abilities within 1.5 seconds deals an additional 6% max Health physical damage, grants you 15% Move Speed and a (150 + 40% bonus Attack Damage) Shield (100 + 30% bonus Attack Damage for ranged champions) for 2 seconds (8s cooldown, 16s cooldown for ranged champions).

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 4% Armor Penetration.

6693.name: Prowler's Claw

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Lethality.

6693.description: Active - Sandswipe: Dash through target enemy champion, dealing (100 + 30% bonus Attack Damage) physical damage. For the next 3 seconds, you deal 15% increased damage to the target. (90s cooldown).

passives.name: Bitter Cold
passives.effect: Damaging Abilities Slow enemies by 30% for 1 second.

passives.name: Shield Reaver
passives.effect: Dealing damage to an enemy champion reduces any shields they gain by (50% | 35% for Ranged Champions) for 3 seconds. When you damage an enemy who is unaffected by Shield Reaver, reduce all shields on them by (50% | 35% for Ranged Champions).Additional damage not applied to targets with shields that only block magic damage.Item performance differs for melee and ranged users.

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Lethality.

passives.name: Ever Rising Moon
passives.effect: Hitting a champion with 2 separate Attacks or Abilities within 1.5 seconds deals an additional 6% max Health physical damage, grants you 15% Move Speed and a (150 + 40% bonus Attack Damage) Shield (100 + 30% bonus Attack Damage for ranged champions) for 0.1 seconds (8s cooldown, 16s cooldown for ranged champions).

passives.effect: At maximum Immolate stacks, your Attacks burn nearby enemies for your Immolate damage per second for 3 seconds.

passives.effect: Every third Attack deals an additional (60 + 45% bonus Attack Damage) true damage.

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 10% Attack Speed.

passives.name: Lifeline
passives.effect: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a 250 - 700 Shield for 3s. In addition, gain 15-35 Attack Damage for 8s (90s ).

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Attack Damage and 50 Health.

passives.name: Void Corruption
passives.effect: For each second damaging enemy champions, deal 3% bonus damage (max 9%). At maximum strength, the bonus damage is dealt as true damage instead.

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 2% Omnivamp and 8 Ability Power.

passives.name: Soulrend
passives.effect: Damaging a champion deals an additional (125 +15% Ability Power magic damage) and grants you 25% Move Speed for 1.5 seconds (40s cooldown per champion). Damaging a new champion will extend the duration of the Move Speed bonus.

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

passives.name: Mythic Passive

7011.description: Active - Hex Bolt: Dash in target direction, unleashing an arc of magic missiles that deal (125 +15% Ability Power) magic damage. Then, gain 30% Move Speed towards enemy champions for 1.5 seconds (40s cooldown). Supersonic's dash cannot pass through terrain.

passives.name: Agony
passives.effect: Deal up to 12% bonus magic damage to Champions based on the target's bonus Health (maxed at 1250 bonus Health).

passives.name: Torment
passives.effect: Dealing damage with Abilities causes enemies to burn for (15 + 1.5% Ability Power) + 1% max Health magic damage per second for 4 seconds.

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Ability Haste.

7014.description: Active - Glaciate: Deal (100+30% Ability Power) magic damage in a cone, Slowing enemies by 65% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies at the center of the cone are Rooted instead (30s cooldown).

7015.name: Ceaseless Hunger

7015.description: Active - Thirsting Slash: Deal (100% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies. Restore (25% Attack Damage + 10% missing Health) for each champion hit (15s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).

passives.name: Mythic Passive

passives.effect: Dealing physical damage grants 20 Move Speed for 3 seconds.

7016.description: Active - Halting Slash: Deal (100% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies, Slowing them by 40% for 3 seconds (15s , reduced by Ability Haste). Can be cast while moving.

passives.name: Spellblade
passives.effect: After using an Ability, your next Attack is enhanced with an additional 12% (9% for Ranged owners) target max Health physical damage On-Hit (1.5s cooldown). If the target is a champion, restore 50% of the enhanced damage (30% for Ranged owners). Spellblade will deal a minimum of (150% base Attack Damage) damage to units, but no more than (250% base Attack Damage) damage to Monsters.

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 5% Armor Penetration and 5% Magic Penetration.

passives.name: Threefold Strike
passives.effect: Attacks grant 20 Move Speed for 3 seconds. If the target is a champion, increase your base Attack Damage by 6% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 5 times (Max increase 30% AD).

passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 2 Armor/Magic Resist increase to Consecrate.Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.Subsequent Devotion shields within 20 seconds only have 25% effect.

7020.name: Shurelya's Requiem

passives.name: Starlit Grace
passives.effect: When affecting champions with Attacks or Abilities in combat, restore 70 Health to the most wounded nearby ally (2s cooldown). Each second spent in combat with champions increases your Heal and Shield Power by 7% (stacking up to 5 times).

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 10 increased health on Starlit Grace's heal.

passives.name: Coordinated Fire
passives.effect: Abilities that Slow or Immobilize a champion deal 36 - 60 (based on level) bonus magic damage and marks them for 4 seconds (6s cooldown per champion). Ally champion damage detonates the mark, dealing an additional 90 - 150 (based on ally level) magic damage and granting you both 20% Move Speed for 2 seconds.

passives.name: Mythic Passive
passives.effect: Grants all other Legendary items 15 Ability Power. Strength of level-scaling effects are based on the ally's level.

8001.name: Anathema's Chains

passives.name: Vendetta
passives.effect: ake up to 30% reduced damage from your Nemesis, 1% per Vendetta stack. You gain stacks over time, and reach the maximum number of stacks after 60 seconds.

passives.name: Vengeance
passives.effect: At maximum stacks, your Nemesis has 20% reduced Tenacity while near you.Active can be cast while dead and at global range. Stacks reset upon choosing a new target. Cannot be cast for 15 seconds while in-combat with champions.

8001.description: Active - Vow: Choose a Nemesis to start building a Vendetta (90s).
